meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> is higher than your <radical>forehead</radical> you better move those <radical>legs</radical> and find a <radical>tree</radical> to climb, because that thing is <kanji>deep</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: You wait until the tsunami is only as <kanji>deep</kanji> as your <reading>shin</reading> (しん). Then you climb down the tree and wade home in the shin-deep water.
